title: JSON schema for .NET Core project.json files

compilationOptions.description: [Deprecated] Options that are passed to the compiler. Use 'buildOptions' instead.

preserveCompilationContext.description: Set this option to preserve reference assemblies and other context data to allow for runtime compilation

buildOptions.description: Options that are passed to the compiler.

preserveCompilationContext.description: Set this option to preserve reference assemblies and other context data to allow for runtime compilation.

compile.description: Defines glob patterns and file path to include for compilation.

include.description: List of file globbing patterns to be included.

exclude.description: List of file globbing patterns to be excluded.

includeFiles.description: List of file paths to be included.

excludeFiles.description: List of file paths to be excluded.

include.description: List of file globbing patterns to be included.

exclude.description: List of file globbing patterns to be included.

mappings.description: Pairs of destination folders and glob patterns specifying additional files to include/exclude.

allOf.description: Defines glob patterns and file paths of resource files to include for compilation.
Defines glob patterns and file paths to include for copying to build output.

packOptions.description: Defines options pertaining to the packaging of the project output into a NuGet package.

summary.description: A short description of the package.

tags.description: A space-delimited list of tags and keywords that describe the package.

owners.description: List of owners of the package.

releaseNotes.description: A description of the changes made in each release of the package.

iconUrl.description: A URL for the image to use as the icon for the package. This should be a 32x32-pixel .png file that has a transparent background.

licenseUrl.description: A link to the license for the package.

requireLicenseAcceptance.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the client needs to ensure that the package license (described by licenseUrl) is accepted before the package is installed.

repository.description: Contains information about the repository where the project is stored.

allOf.description: Defines glob patterns and file paths to include in the generated NuGet package.
Defines glob patterns and file paths to include in publish output.

imports.description: Allow packages supporting these frameworks to be installed in this target, regardless of the compatibility rules.

target.description: Restrict this dependency to matching only a Project or a Package.

dependencies.description: Each dependency is defined by a name and a version. Dependencies are resolved from NuGet feeds defined by your package sources and projects located in the directories specified by the 'global.json' file.

script.description: A command line script or scripts.Available variables:%project:Directory% - The project directory%project:Name% - The project name%project:Version% - The project version

packInclude.description: [Deprecated] Pairs of destination folders and glob patterns specifying additional files to include in the output NuGet package. (data type: JSON map). Example: { "tools/": "tools/**/*.*" }. Use 'files' in 'packOptions' instead.

publishExclude.description: [Deprecated] Glob pattern to specify files to exclude from publish output. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'publishOptions' instead.

compile.description: [Deprecated] Glob pattern to specify files to compile. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'compile' in 'buildOptions' instead.

compileExclude.description: [Deprecated] Glob pattern to specify files to exclude from compilation. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'compile' in 'buildOptions' instead.

compileFiles.description: [Deprecated] Files to include in compilation (overrides 'compileExclude'). (data type: string or array). Example: [ "Folder1/File1.ext", "Folder2/File2.ext" ]. Use 'compile' in 'buildOptions' instead.

content.description: [Deprecated] Glob pattern to specify files to include as content. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'publishOptions' to publish or 'copyToOutput' in 'buildOptions' to copy to build output instead.

contentExclude.description: [Deprecated] Glob pattern to specify files to exclude from the content list. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'publishOptions' to publish or 'copyToOutput' in 'buildOptions' to copy to build output instead.

contentFiles.description: [Deprecated] Files to include as content (overrides 'contentExclude'). (data type: string or array). Example: [ "Folder1/File1.ext", "Folder2/File2.ext" ]. Use 'publishOptions' to publish or 'copyToOutput' in 'buildOptions' to copy to build output instead.

preprocess.description: Glob pattern to specify files to use for preprocessing. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]

preprocessExclude.description: Glob pattern to specify files to exclude from use for preprocessing. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]

preprocessFiles.description: Files to include to use for preprocessing (overrides 'preprocessExclude'). (data type: string or array). Example: [ "Folder1/File1.ext", "Folder2/File2.ext" ]

resource.description: [Deprecated] Glob pattern to specify files to include as resources. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'embed' in 'buildOptions' instead.

resourceExclude.description: [Deprecated] Glob pattern to specify files to exclude from the resources list. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'embed' in 'buildOptions' instead.

resourceFiles.description: [Deprecated] Files to include as resources (overrides 'resourceExclude'). (data type: string or array). Example: [ "Folder1/File1.ext", "Folder2/File2.ext" ]. Use 'embed' in 'buildOptions' instead.

shared.description: Glob pattern to specify files to share with dependent projects. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]

sharedExclude.description: Glob pattern to specify files to exclude from sharing with dependent projects. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]

sharedFiles.description: Files to include for sharing with dependent projects (overrides 'sharedExclude'). (data type: string or array). Example: [ "Folder1/File1.ext", "Folder2/File2.ext" ]

exclude.description: [Deprecated] Glob pattern to indicate files to exclude from other glob patterns, in addition to the default patterns specified in 'excludeBuiltIn'. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'exclude' within 'compile' or 'embed' instead.

excludeBuiltIn.description: [Deprecated] Default glob pattern to indicate files to exclude from other glob patterns. (data type: string or array with glob pattern(s)). Example: [ "Folder1/*.ext", "Folder2/*.ext" ]. Use 'exclude' within 'compile' or 'embed' instead.

testRunner.description: The name of the test runner to use with this project

configurations.description: Configurations are named groups of compilation settings. There are two defaults built into the runtime: 'Debug' and 'Release'.

iconUrl.description: [Deprecated] A URL for the image to use as the icon for the package. This should be a 32x32-pixel .png file that has a transparent background. Use this in 'packOptions' instead.

licenseUrl.description: [Deprecated] A link to the license for the package. Use this in 'packOptions' instead.

requireLicenseAcceptance.description: [Deprecated] A Boolean value that specifies whether the client needs to ensure that the package license (described by licenseUrl) is accepted before the package is installed. Use this in 'packOptions' instead.

owners.description: [Deprecated] List of owners of the package. Use this in 'packOptions' instead.

projectUrl.description: A URL for the home page of the package.

summary.description: [Deprecated] A short description of the package. Use this in 'packOptions' instead.

tags.description: [Deprecated] A space-delimited list of tags and keywords that describe the package. Use this in 'packOptions' instead.

title.description: The human-friendly title of the package

releaseNotes.description: [Deprecated] A description of the changes made in each release of the package. Use this in 'packOptions' instead.

language.description: The locale ID for the package, such as en-us.

frameworks.description: Target frameworks that will be built, and dependencies that are specific to the build of this project for that framework.

namedResource.description: Overrides the generated resource names with custom ones.

repository.description: [Deprecated] Contains information about the repository where the project is stored. Use this in 'packOptions' instead.

scripts.description: Scripts to execute during the various stages.

version.description: The version of the project/package. Examples: 1.2.3, 1.2.3-beta, 1.2.3-*

tools.description: Project-specific command line tools accessible when in the project.json directory.

runtimes.description: List of runtime identifiers supported by this project (used when building standalone applications).
